meta.title: Product Details
meta.description: FRTIER BIOMEDICAL Domestic Optimum Fetal Bovine Serum (FBS, Optimum) details and application examples.

product.name: FRTIER BIOMEDICAL Domestic Optimum FBS (Fetal Bovine Serum)

desc.desc_basic: Sourced from healthy 6–8-month calves from high-quality domestic ranches. Highly versatile: suitable for most stem cells, immune cells, common tumor cell lines, hard-to-culture cells, and primary cells.
desc.desc_cells: HUC-MSCs, A549, HEB, Caprine endometrial cells, GM12878, K562, HeLa, 293T, HEK293, KMB17, HCC1937, 3T3-L1, MRC-5, MDBK, Caov3, CTLL-2, Hepa1-6, MARC-145, H9C2, NRK-52E, McCoy5A, HK-2, HUC-MSC, HEP3B2.1-7, U373, Caco-2, THP-1, RBE, R1610, Caski, MB49, MG63, MC38, MDCK, NCI-H157, NCI-H446, PA-1, etc.
